effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Defense by two stages for each target hit.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply raise the user’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply raise the user’s Defense stat.
